Hi. I am getting an error when doing a surface plot using the theme `:ggplot2` (my favorite :slightly_frowning_face:). Just to make sure I didn’t mess up installing too many packages, I isolated an environment with just

  [28b8d3ca] GR v0.53.0
  [ccf2f8ad] PlotThemes v2.0.0
  [91a5bcdd] Plots v1.10.2

I tried with all the themes and there is no problem, except with `:ggplot2`. I try a simple surface plot and it throws me the error
```Error showing value of type Plots.Plot{Plots.GRBackend}:
ERROR: UndefVarError: minorticks not defined```
